casebody.data:
STEINBERG, Respondent, v. ROSENTHAL, Appellant. (City Court of New York,

General Term.

May 23, 1896.) Action by Dora Stein-berg against Samuel Rosenthal. A. H. Derrick, for appellant. E. Rosenthal, for respondent. McOARTHY, j.

This is an appeal from an order allowing plaintiff to sue as a poor person. While it is true that the equities may be with the defendant, yet, the court having the right *1133to grant the order, the only question for us to determine is, was there an abuse of judicial discretion? We cannot say that. Order affirmed, No costs. All concur.
